problem.title: üòñ Why I Built This (The Problem)
problem.description:
Every FPS game uses different sensitivity formulas.

A 0.5 sensitivity in Valorant feels completely different from 0.5 in Counter-Strike 2 (it's actually ~1.591).

Although I can typically fine-tune my sensitivity manually via in game sliders to feel "pretty close", it's never quite "perfect."

steps.description: aimii will display the recommended sensitivity using game conversion formulas
